issue.title: [Java] Add apis to debug alloc failures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4086](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4086). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On allocation failures, it's useful to know where the memory is being used in the tree of allocators (for debugging). One way to do this would be by adding APIs to :
1. get root allocator from a given allocator
1. get summary of usage/limit from an allocator upto N levels (N is an input arg)
